segments.text: Looking at this kitchen, I can't help but feel a bit worried.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is standing there, oblivious to the water spilling from the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's flooding the floor, and she might slip any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her dress and apron are going to get soaked if she doesn't stop it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Then there's the boy on that wobbly stool, stretching for the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If it tips, he could fall and hurt himself badly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is right there, waiting eagerly, but she could get knocked over too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: All this water makes the floor so slippery for everyone.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinets are getting damaged from the overflow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone turns off the faucet before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The outside garden seems calm, but inside it's a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: These kids are taking a big risk just for some cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR
